title: Remove a saved favourite
description:
Deletes a saved search, category or seller from the currently authenticated
  user's favourites.
permission_required:
MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post
      comments.

path.name: type
path.description:
The type of favourite (must be "Category", "Search", "AttributeSearch"
        or "Seller").

returns.description: <RemovedFavouriteResponse> Details indicating whether the operation succeeded.

fields.name: SearchId
fields.description: The ID of the saved favourite.

fields.name: Response
fields.description: A description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: Removed
fields.description: Indicates whether the favourite was removed.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful
